Function Documentation

void Hypertable::Config::alias ( const String &  cmdline_opt,
const String &  file_opt,
bool  overwrite = false 
)

Setup command line option alias for config file option.

Typically used in policy init_options functions. Command line option has higher priority.

Parameters:
cmdline_opt - command line option name
file_opt - cfg file option name
overwrite - overwrite existing alias

const Desc &  desc,
bool  allow_unregistered = false 
)

Parse config file.

Throws CONFIG_BAD_CFG_FILE on error

Parameters:
fname - config filename
desc - options description
allow_unregistered - allow unregistered options
